title: Lowest benefit incidence of social protection programs to poorest quintile
description: In 2021, only 4.68% of the total social protection and labor benefits in Burkina Faso went to the poorest quintile, one of the lowest rates globally.

title: Lowest benefit incidence of social insurance programs to poorest quintile
description: In 2018, a mere 3.01% of the total social insurance benefits in Burkina Faso were received by the poorest quintile, marking it as one of the lowest globally.

title: Highest government expenditure per student in tertiary education
description: In 2016, Burkina Faso's government expenditure per tertiary student was 351.47% of GDP per capita, one of the highest rates in the world.
